alert.note: Alert for Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 19 at 7:02PM CDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... 12 Mile Creek Near Dumont affecting Traverse County. .The following river forecasts include forecast precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any additional future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...12 Mile Creek Near Dumont. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 PM CDT Saturday was 10.6 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning.
